answers.answer: Praying all goes well I was just told yesterday that I have hbp I'm 29 weeks just praying for a safe delivery !

question: So I posted that I might be induced one I reach 37 weeks because my blood pressure was so high and doctors think I might have slight preeclampsia. .... at my appointment on Monday I had to go to the hospital because My blood pressure went all the way up too 182/something and i had gained 5pds in 3 days. ... after spending a while there they sent me home and told me no more working and bed rest. ...... so I go again to the doctors tomorrow and they will probably send me to the hospital because my bp is so high. ..... I am praying that they will induce me because of all the complications .... I am so swollen its past the point of normal pregnancy swelling. .... both of my hands are have numbness. .... and all of my joints hurt when I move.... ughhhhhh .... I am praying that they induce me for my little girls health because this blood pressure problem isn't good for her :(..... will update everyone tomorrow after my appointment :(
title: update***/ vent
